com.github.vbauer.houdini.util

Class CollectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.vbauer.houdini.util.CollectionUtils

  • public final class CollectionUtils
extends Object
    Util-class to work with collections.
    Author:
    Vladislav Bauer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean isEmpty(Collection<?> collection)
      Check if collection is an empty.
      static Object oneOrMany(Collection<?> collection)
      Method uses the following logic: If collection is empty, it returns null. If collection contains only one element, it returns this element. Otherwise it returns the given collection
      static <T> int size(T[] array)
      Get a size of the given array.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(Collection<?> collection)
        Check if collection is an empty. Method is null-safe.
        Parameters:
        collection - collection with data
        Returns:
        true if empty, false - otherwise.

      • size

        public static <T> int size(T[] array)
        Get a size of the given array. Method is null-safe.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the array
        Parameters:
        array - array with data
        Returns:
        size of the given array

      • oneOrMany

        public static Object oneOrMany(Collection<?> collection)
        Method uses the following logic:
        • If collection is empty, it returns null.
        • If collection contains only one element, it returns this element.
        • Otherwise it returns the given collection
        Parameters:
        collection - collection with data or null.
        Returns:
        collection or single reference
